column3:
‚ÄúMethod: Wolf-LX Vap
Grind: Medium
Pulls: 4-7
Rating: 4.5/5.0

Well, this was an impulse purchase. And i'm glad for it. Usually, my delivery service has a rounded selection of good kind. Its pretty consistent. And every so often, they carry some new stuff that I haven't come across to sample. Today was one of those days. And Super Glue was the mismatched sock that stood out. I mean the name sounds powerful. But I've b...‚Äù
‚Äúmy favorite   always works   never lets me down  (I'm really picky about my meds. I admit it, I am a snob about meds.  This is a cure all for whatever ails me.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis high was instant, great, and long lasting. My husband and I love smoking this and going on strolls through Berkeley. This is a relaxing, euphoric, and humorous strain. Everything rolls off the shoulders, leaving the user feeling relaxed, but not sleepy. This is one of my new favorite strains. It is testing at 28% at the CBCB in Berkeley as of 2/17‚Äù

‚ÄúBy far, my all time favorite.   The 'Glue' always works.  Never lets me down.  Sometimes it takes a bit 4 my body to adjust to a new strain.  Never with this. Superlative. The bomb. Can't live without. Are just a few things that come to mind with the Glue.  I cannot recommend this strain highly enough.  It's dynamite.  If it's possible to be 'in love' with a plant, well, count me in.‚Äù
‚ÄúAmazing strain, almost instantaneous high, makes me feel great, probably my favourite‚Äù

‚ÄúI have not had the super glue from Seedism but here in California we have a super glue from King klones. Photos look similar but King klones is a cross of gorilla glue #4 and gelato I believe. Anyways amazing smell / taste / look and the effects are jaw dropping, Literally... Throw on a movie or some music because you are about to have a blast‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat for a wake an bake a must try!‚Äù
‚Äúawesome smoke, great at night and definitely great for sporting events  (as a fan) lol‚Äù

‚ÄúI'm my picture of superglue it shows the intense colors and sugar frosting of the incredible strain. It's my go to strain when I really need help with stomach and pain issues. I love the smell and taste of this beautiful bud, but nothing comes close to its distinct look and sugar coated frosting. Potent, potent, potent.‚Äù
‚ÄúGlue to üí∫‚Äù

‚ÄúVery nice indica dominant. Very mellow, nice body high. Leaves you with that giggly, roller coaster feeling in your stomach. Great for relaxation and laughter. Still uplifting enough to keep you social, as long as you can be goofy.‚Äù

‚ÄúJust had this strain this week and instantly fell in love. So in love, that is my favorite strain! The bud is so insane! Its so sticky and smells immaculate. The high is what sets it off for me. I feel instantly uplifted in a good mood, but I'm also super chill! Not a I wanna be lazy chill, like the mellow I'm just vibing chill.‚Äù

‚ÄúSlow burning best to smoke from a bowl. Goes down smooth has a earthy taste then the sweetness hits you. Gives you a slight head high and your body fully relaxed but not stuck to the couch. Really good morning smoke not a sleepy smoke. Love it.‚Äù

‚ÄúSmells wonderful, and tastes great. When smoked from a spoon pipe -- which is how I've consumed it --
 it tastes mostly sweet, with earthy, woody and piney tones in the background. Good stuff.

This strain's effects remind me a bit of Gorilla Glue. Like Gorilla Glue, Superglue starts off with a head high. It's not as racy as Gorilla Glue, though. Superglue is clear-headed and very happy for the first 30 minutes or so...‚Äù

‚ÄúNot particularly strong, the high takes awhile to creep up on you but after it does best believe its great. It worked for my pain, depression, anxiety and overall chill level. I feel great hoping it was gonna help me fall asleep who knows maybe after another bowl I'll fall asleep!‚Äù

‚ÄúThis hybrid has 3 great things.  The cross of the 2 strains are perfect the smell and taste are wonderful and the indica body buzz is nice with no real couch lock. But I did use it in the volcano and watch out. ! One ballon and done   Invest in a volcano people. It's worth it's weight in gold‚Äù
‚Äúdense, sticky, grains, and wow is this pungent! easy smoke, light cough but nothing overwhelming. the high was clear, and lasted longer than expected. very satisfied with this strain‚Äù

‚ÄúWow. I heard about this strain but was a bit skeptical. But all I can say is: I am FLYING. One bowl and I'm absolutely smashed. Very indica. Not too heavy but I feel it's going to end up that way into a deep sleep. I like it.‚Äù

‚ÄúI dont ever get on here to review strains....but, I just picked up an 8th of Superglue by State Flower in Las Vegas and I am blown away by this strain! The look, the smell(I just wanna live in the bag), the smoke/taste(sweet and smooth), and the high(relaxed, energetic, great body high that eases back pain from surgery last year). I encourage you....GO pick up this strain immediately! You will NOT be disappointed. In...‚Äù

‚ÄúAfter about a decade of being against weed due to bad experiences in high school from dirt ass weee making me paranoid, anxious, and other negative effects, I tried Superglue. I finished uni and became a social worker. Saw many horrors of children being neglected and other bad shit due to scumbag parents and the workload on top of that gave way to stress, anxiety, and bad depression. My buddy said I should smoke but ...‚Äù

‚ÄúWell balanced. Stable. Strong. Clean. Long Lasting. Are some of the words that come to mind when I think of the quality of the high. Can be smoked on its own or blended with other strains when dabbing. Brings me back to the way I felt on quality cannabis 25 years ago but also keeps me right here in the now. I notice the sound of the wind moving through the trees. Good for connecting with nature and with inner self. V...‚Äù

‚ÄúSuper Glue is a great anytime strain for me. It relaxes me puts me in a great mood. I also feel very creative and it's great for social activities. The taste and smell never disappoints. However I've found a better version of Super Glue (Gelato #45 X Gorilla Glue #4) that is in my opinion WAY better.‚Äù
‚ÄúReally good strain. Nice skunky smell as soon as you open the container followed by a slight pine. Smokes well in a bowl. Relaxing buzz with slight euphoria.‚Äù

‚ÄúI‚Äôm sort of a newb and I this strain did a bit of damage. This üí© had me off in the twilight zone for a couple hours.  Unfortunately I woke up the next day still high trying to sale loans.  It burned a bit going down, the high was intense for me.  The smell was funky, kinda pine conish with a skunk like aftersmell.  I have an 1/8 and it will probably last me several months as I do not plan on smoking this too often! ...‚Äù

‚ÄúI wasn't aware of the genealogy before buying it, I was expecting a GG4 cross.
It's a decent strain nothing too spectacular. I'm having a hard time keeping my eyes open and focusing. All of my muscles are relaxed while I have couch lock.‚Äù

‚ÄúSmoke Review:
Sticky, Dense, Medium Aroma with that infamous white" (earthy/pungent/sour&skunk) stench as soon as nug is cracked
column5: or lit. Taste on inhale is normal at first then spikes in curiosity while when exhaling
column6: practically makes you lick your chops
column7: as the skunk/pungent/earth ("white") taste then stomps down the door and even lingers as an aftertaste for a few minutes

column3: ‚ÄúOne of the best strains I have tried in some time, it has a pungent aroma that is pleasant to smell. It's flavor and smoke is light and smooth, doesn't choke me up. The high is happy and hyper for me, once I start talking on this bud I can't stop. I smoke this before I go do P90 X regularly. As for preference this is exactly what I want a strain to do for me. It's perfect <3‚Äù

‚ÄúAfter having gorilla glue #4, I decided an uptick in the indicated would do wonders. I definitely believe this gives more of a cbd/indica feel, it produces a slight spatial awareness impairment that's perfect for falling asleep or relaxing. Pain can still be felt in the body but it allows you to rest your muscles more easily.‚Äù

‚Äúsmall airy buds no orange/red/purple colors all green. My experience with northern lights has been euphoric with lots of laughter combine this with afghani's physically relaxing effects and you have yourself a top shelf 5 star strain. Also felt very creative. This is my favorite strain for socializing without a doubt. I got my dick sucked once while smoking this and the person had to stop cuz i just kept laughing out...‚Äù
‚ÄúReally good strain. Nice skunky smell as soon as you open the container followed by a slight pine. Smokes well in a bowl. Relaxing buzz with slight euphoria.‚Äù
‚ÄúChilled out. Dancing in my seat. Not a worry in the world. Would be a five but it's lacking the euphoria.‚Äù

‚Äú15 minutes in and I'm feeling happy, relaxed and melted into my couch, not worried about pain in my lumbar (spinal stenosis) and my headache went away.  

The flowers are full of trichomes and light and dark pine colors.  The nugs are small to medium size and  some fluffy yet dense and packed on the inside.‚Äù
‚ÄúJust picked this up in Santa Cruz tested at 21%... Good hybrid, uplifting high with a heavy stone feeling and a earthy pine/kush sweetness‚Äù

‚ÄúThis strain is grown here in Illinois by Goldleaf.  While their label says Goldleaf the name of the grow house is Ataraxia located at Albion Illinois.  This strain will become highly sought after.  The total analysis lab results say 31+ %!  This one takes over.  Marvelous pain relief and head high!  I have a spinal cord injury and this is as good as it gets from a flower bud.‚Äù
‚ÄúEasy-going, adaptive, and relaxation full with euphoria‚Äù

‚ÄúThis strain is great. I have smoked superglue about 4 times, and I have thoroughly enjoyed it. It starts off with a head high, making you feel lightheaded (in a pleasant way). Then it moves on to the body, making you feel heavy, happy, and relaxed. After a little bit, I  started to realize why it is named superglue, because the couch lock is quite strong, almost as if you were super-glued to your couch.‚Äù

‚ÄúI have smoked superglue a good bit, and have thoroughly enjoyed it. It starts off with a short head high, making you a bit lightheaded (in a good way.) Then It quickly moves to a strong body high. The body high, makes you feel heavy, happy, and relaxed. I can see why this is called superglue, because the couch lock is quite strong. I would definitely recommend this strain if you are looking to just relax, and have fu...‚Äù
‚ÄúBro when I tell you this bud had me smacked... I was dumb high, amazing and enjoyable strain. Good for sleeping problems!‚Äù
‚Äúsuperglue is some goooooood hybrid Afghan hash plant & northern lights , indica dominate  Lil energetic,  good relaxing socializing cannabis‚Äù

‚ÄúI was looking for a new hybrid. A local grower here in Nevada County, CA recommended this. I was timid but I‚Äôm glad I bought this. Flower smoke, took about 1-2 minutes before I felt the full effects. A lot of hybrids give me anxiety or make me paranoid. This strain did not cause any of this, even at a high dose. Very mellow and relaxing, able to stay focused on a program or projects. I primarily smoke at night. So th...‚Äù
‚ÄúBro when I tell you this bud had me smacked... I was dumb high, amazing and enjoyable strain. Good for sleeping problems!‚Äù

‚Äúuniquely amazing strain (for me at least). 

my mind is calm but cerebral, my body buzzing with a pleasant energy. 

the taste and smell are right up my alley: skunky, gassy, piney, funky. exhaling it gives that complex, flavorful burn in the throat that feels just satisfying. 

I truly am in love‚Äù

‚ÄúI like a really strong psychedelic high. After switching from smoking to vaping a few years back, I was coming to the conclusion that nothing would get me to where I wanted to be except dabbing concentrates. But I do occasionally keep trying flowers. Every one that I've gotten, I can do 4 Volcano balloons, and I'm still nowhere near where I wanted to be. Then I picked up a jar of Superglue flower; I was getting ready...‚Äù

‚ÄúSuperglue brings calming relaxation to¬†the mind and body, but leaves you functional and energetic enough for social activities or a productive afternoon.
Here is my review Bc Superglue is a hybrid a cross between Northern Lights and Afghani. A real true Indica strain bred by two very good Indica‚Äôs. Giving you a wonderful way to combat nausea, pain, fatigue,and any other ailments. Use Superglue and see how it could po...‚Äù

After a little bit, I  started to realize why it is named superglue, because the couch lock is quite strong, almost as if you were super-glued to your couch.‚Äù

Ear to ear smile‚Äù

I'm glad I did! This strain looks beautiful with big, dense, chartreuse colored buds that were so covered in trichomes they left your fingers dusty just putting one in a grinder.  It has a very strong almost pungent aroma similar to Sou...‚Äù

‚ÄúIncredible strain. I'm very sensitive to paranoia from some strains, but also need something uplifting and creative for the evenings. Not only is this high clear, but it's very comforting. Effects were instant and immediately relaxed my anxiety a great deal. This strain reminds me of a nice Sunday cup of coffee; warm and comforting yet invigorating and clear. I am blown away by the perfect balance of body and mind. T...‚Äù

don't buy Wise brand potato chips

‚ÄúIt's really good i like it a lot. It's great for anxiety and depression. Exceptionally gr eat for chronic pain. I have chronic back pain fibromyalgia chronic migraines and arthritis it helps all of them.‚Äù

‚ÄúI have tried a handful of strains, but this one takes the cake as my favorite strain I ever smoked. I usually get bored of a strain, but this one I have been smoking for weeks and continue to make it my number one. It hits you by relaxing sensation on your head and spreading slowly through  your whole body. It gives you enough energy to move. Hits 50/50 and the right amount of it.‚Äù
‚ÄúKnocked my headache out in minutes, maybe seconds. I am less aware of my back/hip/leg pain level and can laugh off some of the sharper pains. This is definitely on my short list.‚Äù

‚ÄúWas a little disappointed I just missed Verano Growers at CCM today by an hour or so, but took my Tender's suggestion to try Super Glue since all of Verano's magic was 25% off & DAMN! ‚ÄúLately I've been experimenting with Indicas, because they provide wonderful benefits. But, lately I've been feeling a bit bogged down and today I took a step in the opposite direction and chose a hybrid. Superglue's massive amounts of CBD and matching THC content make it an easy pick. Also, the Afghan/Northern lights genetics made Superglue sound too good to pass on. The flower I received comprised of tight nugs of t...‚Äù

‚ÄúSuperglue will have you staring at a wall contemplating life's meanings in a matter of puffs. Really quick and potent, the smell is ridiculously strong. The high is pretty clear for a potent indica. Laughs, clumsiness, good times will be had with this strain. Best way to describe it is it makes me feel like when I first started smoking if that makes any sense. Highly recommend trying this one‚Äù
‚ÄúHands down, this is the #1 tastiest strain out there! If you want the flavor of pure dank on your lips just smoke this! If you like any Gorilla Glue strain, this is like the Mother of All Glues‚Äù

‚ÄúI have been familiar with this strain and can say that It is a good all day strain. Its relaxing with comforting dosage, its heavy, yet real good creak of the floors and is great for both relaxing or active activities. It creates appetite and a euphoria that is one of my current favorites for anytime use! I often had this strain as a nug run concentrate.‚Äù
‚ÄúGood Strain, NOT the Best Tasting, After 5 Minutes Hit Me Like A Ton Of Bricks‚Äù

Definitely a cross between indica and sativa but for me definitely leans more toward sativa effects. Positive and uplifting and still quite functional. Highly recommend and will continue to use it to see how it plays out.‚Äù

‚ÄúPerfect after work/weekend smoke. Makes you relaxed without putting you to bed. You can just chill on this one. If you wanna watch a movie and not pass out this one works. Burn one but gotta  run out to the store this one gives you enough energy to do so without feeling like dead weight.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis strain is amazing!!!!! I got it off a whim and I'm super glad I did! I was looking for a nice smoke and will get me really really stoned. It is also really good for wanting to get the munchies. Within maybe 10 minutes, the munchies hit super hard! Super into this strain! Highly recommend!‚Äù

‚ÄúIf I didn't read the description I would have thought this a member of the sour diesel,gorilla glue family tree.Thick,sticky,chunky buds with a sweet caramel and pine scent in the jar.It has an earthy,pine taste that is pungent.The smell taste and appearance aren't anything special,but superglue is really potent.‚Äù
‚ÄúReally good happy high, takes away pain, and great for stress and depression.‚Äù
‚ÄúI'm having a productive day with superglue.‚Äù

‚ÄúNice high, not too extreme. I smoked this flavour in shatter form so flavours were more noticable. Nice sweetness with a slight caramel flavour to it. Still feel functional to do get up and do things would get this again‚Äù

‚ÄúI decided to try this at snap sale and I am so happy I did!
I love how piney and lemony it tasted on the in&exhale. I would say the high it hitting me in waves. Each one is pushing me more and more into the couch... But in a good way. I smoked a whole bowl to myself. (Yes, it was that kind of day.) Now I am relaxed, happy, and enjoying some good tv.
I like this strain a lot, it has me feeling mighty right.‚Äù
‚ÄúAwesome night time strain to melt stress off‚Äù

‚Äúabsolutely outstanding and hits like a true indica. My last bro came in at 28% THC. I have found that this needs a good three-plus weeks to cure and then it is beyond smooth. It has almost a smokey, spicy smell to it what burns smooth and even. It hits hard but not uncomfortable.‚Äù
